Network sessions with unusual client-to-.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log. For common protocols/ports (e.g., HTTP/S on 80/443, DNS on 53), calculate the ratio of 'orig_bytes' to 'resp_bytes'. Use descriptive statistics (mean, median, IQR) or clustering techniques to identify connections with significantly different byte ratios compared to the norm for that protocol/port.

Network connections using unexpected pro.Data: Zeek conn.log, Windows Event ID 4688, Windows Event ID 5156
Network connections using unexpected pro.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log for traffic using unexpected protocols on common ports (e.g., ICMP over port 80). Correlate network connections (Zeek conn.log) with process creation/network activity logs (Windows Event ID 4688, 5156) on endpoints to identify network connections originating from processes with low frequency of network activity or unknown executables. Use frequency analysis on process names associated with network connections.
